title: Sri Lanka Coastal Negombo Escape with Daily Breakfast, Drinks & Lunch or Dinner
description:
A coastal paradise nestled on the edge of the deep blue Indian Ocean, Jetwing Sea is the perfect escape for all serenity seekers. Located on the pristine Negombo beach strip, this hotel offers a splendid seaside stay with a lavish spa, ultra-superior rooms with spectacular views, local and international meals by exemplary culinary artists and two swimming pools to dive into and create a wave of your own.

Let the adventure begin as you step into your room with exotic views and a luxurious bathtub, where you can soak away your daily stress. A Reflexology Bar will give you much-needed relaxation and a rooftop spa will strip you of all your worries (extra charges apply). The onsite restaurants serve gastronomical delights as you pack yourself with energy for a volleyball match with your family on the beach. The alluring Indian Ocean is at your beck and call and accessible from all parts of the property. Rest, relax and rejuvenate in this Sri Lankan paradise by Jetwing.
